segments.text: Dad , you've been driving for three hours . Why don't we have a switch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There're a lot of chuckholes on this old highway . Driving on it is experience-demanding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Trust me . I've been driving for two years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . You drive and do be careful .
segments.speaker: S2
